banner.title: DOVIRA - online healthcare you can trust
banner.subtitle: Join the waitlist - be the first to know when we launch

ourServices.description1: Connect with qualified doctors through high-quality video calls. Get medical advice and consultations from the comfort of your home.
ourServices.description2: With DOVIRA, get prescriptions from our online doctors directly in the app. Download them for easy access whenever necessary.
ourServices.description3: Get an official sick leave certificate from a licensed doctor remotely — no clinic visits, no waiting rooms, just professional care from home.
ourServices.description4: DOVIRA cares for your pets too! Request a vet house call or schedule a video consultation to ensure your furry friends get the medical attention they need.

whyChoose.description1: Access quality healthcare services without leaving your home, saving you time and hassle.
whyChoose.description2: From human health to veterinary care, DOVIRA offers a wide range of medical services to meet all your needs.
whyChoose.description3: Our team consists of experienced and licensed medical professionals who provide compassionate care tailored to your specific requirements.
whyChoose.description4: Connect with a doctor anytime, day or night, and receive the consultation you need without delay.

priorities.title: DOVIRA in your browser - launching soon
priorities.description: You’ll soon be able to access all DOVIRA features directly from your browser — no downloads needed.
priorities.description2: Leave your email, and we’ll notify you as soon as the platform goes live.

getStarted.title: DOVIRA is coming to your smartphone very soon
getStarted.description: The app is not available for download yet, but we're launching on the App Store and Google Play very soon.
getStarted.description2: Join the waitlist to be among the first to get notified.

contact.title: Want to join DOVIRA?
contact.description: Whether you're a patient or a medical professional - leave your contact details and we’ll reach out before we launch.

modal.title: Please, select your role
modal.message: Please select your role before proceeding
